title: Adelaide celebrations
creator_credit: Penny Chapman, Terry Jennings, Lesley Hammond and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Excerpts from the many theatre arts and crafts on display at Adelaide Festival time. An interesting study of Adelaide at the time of its biennial festival of the arts, in 1976.
